snippet: Freddy Garcia allowed four hits and two runs in six and two-thirds innings as he joined his fellow Yankee pitchers in containing the Rangers offense for the third consecutive night.
abstract: New York Yankees defeat Texas Rangers, 3-2; Yankees pitcher Freddy Garcia has another solid outing.
lead_paragraph: Freddy Garcia allowed four hits and two runs in six and two-thirds innings as he joined his fellow Yankee pitchers in containing the Rangers offense for the third consecutive night.

headline.seo: Freddy Garcia Pitches Yankees Past Texas Rangers
headline.main: Garcia Is Latest Yankee to Thwart Texas
headline.print_headline: Garcia Is Latest Yankee to Thwart Texas
